byline.original: By SHANNON DOYNE and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

abstract: Will online instruction become a popular alternative to face-to-face classes?
snippet: Will online instruction become a popular alternative to face-to-face classes?
lead_paragraph: Online learning has proliferated in recent years. Have you ever taken a class exclusively via computer? If so, how does it compare to being in a classroom? Would you consider online instruction for attaining a college degree? What about a graduate degree?

headline.main: Would You Like to Take a Class Online?
